title: Calculate Asset Retirement Obligation (ARO)
description: An accountant needs to calculate the Asset Retirement Obligation (ARO) for a large piece of mining equipment, which is the estimated future cost to dismantle and dispose of it.

tasks.description: Estimate the future cost to dismantle and dispose of the equipment in today's dollars.
tasks.expected_outcome: The accountant estimates a future cost of $200,000.

tasks.description: Estimate the useful life of the asset and select an appropriate discount rate.
tasks.expected_outcome: The useful life is determined to be 20 years with a discount rate of 5%.

tasks.description: Calculate the present value of the future disposal cost, which is the ARO to be recorded on the balance sheet.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent calculates the ARO and records the corresponding journal entry.
